H0.text: What was the name of the American Presidential retreat before it was called Camp David. Hi-Catoctin

H1.text: What was the name of the American Presidential retreat before it was called Camp David. Presidential Pines

H2.text: What was the name of the American Presidential retreat before it was called Camp David. Catoctin Heights

H3.text: What was the name of the American Presidential retreat before it was called Camp David. Shangrala

A4.text: U.S. President Franklin Roosevelt named his holiday retreat Shangri-La in 1942, which was later renamed Camp David in 1953.
